Title: Life of Pi
Overview: The story of an Indian boy named Pi, a zookeeper's son who finds himself in the company of a hyena, zebra, orangutan, and a Bengal tiger after a shipwreck sets them adrift in the Pacific Ocean.
Keywords: ocean, shipwreck, hindu, tiger, faith, zookeeper, teenage boy, cargo ship, lifeboat, injured animal
production_companies: Ingenious Film Partners, Ingenious Media, Dune Entertainment, Fox 2000 Pictures, Big Screen Productions, Haishang Films
Cast: Suraj Sharma, Irrfan Khan, Ayush Tandon
